derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting a blow with a stick): from Spanish bastonada, from bastón 'stick, cudgel', from late Latin bastum 'stick'

means.word_mean: 1. a cudgel used to give someone a beating on the soles of the feet
